mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, u.username, e.exam_number, tc.id AS classroom_id, tc.classroom_name, c.name AS category_name, p.project_name, DATE_FORMAT(ep.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS exam_time FROM ted_enroll e INNER JOIN sys_user u ON e.user_id = u.id AND u.id = #{userId} INNER JOIN ted_exam_plan ep ON e.exam_plan_id = ep.id AND ep.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN ted_project p ON ep.exam_project_id = p.id AND p.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN ted_category c ON p.category_id = c.id AND c.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ted_classroom tc ON e.classroom_id = tc.id AND tc.is_deleted = 0 WHERE e.exam_number = #{examNumber} AND e.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
